channel.title: Looking for a good host (you need a router) dont spam this
channel.description: Hi i am a proud owner and coder of a hamachi server called Flames Of Death. Mobody plays hamachi so i want to find a host to host my server for it to become a regular server. I want this because i like having the joy of being owner on a popular server and if i get a host i predict the server will be popular.

item.title: Looking for a good host (you need a router) dont spam this
item.dc:creator: @xx_ciao_xx imanubnoob
item.description:
@xx_ciao_xx wrote:

graham are u graham from grahams server and ive tried everything to port forward but it wont work

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good host (you need a router) dont spam this
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

xx ciao xx:

does it have to be called jamescsape? i wanted it to be Flames Of Death

It’s not too hard to create a free forum, look a site up and do it yourself. You may wish to host it yourself, I am sure you can find a port forwarding tutorial for your router somewhere on the net.

Read full topic
